title: Interactive Exercise: File Copy with Error Handling
description:
Create a file copy function that:
1. Copies content from source file to destination file
2. Uses with statement for both files
3. Handles FileNotFoundError if source doesn't exist
4. Adds a header line to the copied file: "--- Copy of [filename] ---"
5. Returns True if successful, False if source not found

**Your task:**
Implement copy_file(source, destination)
